page.title: 17LEISURE ACTIVITIES 1985
page.content: On Thursday,July 4th,we went into Carmarthen to do a questionnaire for the Domesday survey.This is some of the information we got,mostly people spend their spare time going to pubs, and no one said they visited the museum. People thought that there are more facilities for the age group 18- 30 than other groups for those over 50.They thought the age group that had least facilities was 11-18. When asked what they would like to have in Carmarthen people said a cinema and a theatre. When we asked people for their own ideas about what they would like to see in Carmarthen, the things that were mentioned were :- A proper hall,a wild life park, a zoo and an extension on the community centre. By Emma Phillips,Melanie Rice, Leighton Keenan, Michael Williams, Kathleen Keogh, Stephanie Evans,Claire
